meanings.definition: The pancreas or thymus gland of an animal, used as food.
meanings.sent1: I tried a bite of the sweetbread at the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious sweetbread dish for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The sweetbread looked so strange on the plate, but it tasted surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: The sweetbread was like a culinary adventure for my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sweetbread filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A dish made from the pancreas or thymus gland of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The sweetbread on the menu intrigued me, so I decided to order it.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty was their unique sweetbread recipe.
meanings.sent3: When the waiter brought out the sweetbread, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The sweetbread was a symphony of flavors in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the sweetbread was perfectly crispy and delicious.
